text: @realDonaldTrump The @gop Governor who is the head of the Nat Gov Assoc, @NatlGovsAssoc, support assistance for the states.  And since you have pushed all of the responsibility of the #COVID19 response and costs they need help before layoffs, furlows and default happens.  GROW UP!
